title: Tenant upgrade fails with "CustomizedTabConfigRestEndPointUpgrader" error
content:
The suite upgrade fails at the tenant upgrade stage. In the log file, there's a "CustomizedTabConfigRestEndPointUpgrader" error.

Cause

There's a custom field added in Grid columns under the Customized Tab setting, but this field has already been deleted from Studio.

Solution

Contact your support team to help skipping the "CustomizedTabConfigRestEndPointUpgrader" step duringÂ content upgrade.
